member.name: IMFCapturePreviewSink.GetMirrorState
member.summary: Gets the current mirroring state of the video preview stream.
member.param: Receives the value TRUE if mirroring is enabled, or FALSE if mirroring is disabled.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCapturePreviewSink.GetRotation
member.summary: Gets the rotation of the video preview stream.
member.param: The zero-based index of the stream. You must specify a video stream.
Receives the image rotation, in degrees.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCapturePreviewSink.SetCustomSink
member.summary: Sets a custom media sink for preview.
member.param: A pointer to the interface of the media sink.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCapturePreviewSink.SetMirrorState
member.summary: Enables or disables mirroring of the video preview stream.
member.param: If TRUE, mirroring is enabled. If FALSE, mirror is disabled.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCapturePreviewSink.SetRenderHandle
member.param: A handle to the window. The preview sink draws the video frames inside this window.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCapturePreviewSink.SetRenderSurface
member.summary: Specifies a Microsoft DirectComposition visual for preview.
member.param: A pointer to a DirectComposition visual that implements the interface.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCapturePreviewSink.SetRotation
member.param: The zero-based index of the stream to rotate. You must specify a video stream.
The amount to rotate the video, in degrees. Valid values are 0, 90, 180, and 270. The value zero restores the video to its original orientation.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCapturePreviewSink.SetSampleCallback
member.summary: Sets a callback to receive the preview data for one stream.
member.param: The zero-based index of the stream. The index is returned in the pdwSinkStreamIndex parameter of the method.
A pointer to the interface. The caller must implement this interface.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCapturePreviewSink.UpdateVideo
member.summary: Updates the video frame. Call this method when the preview window receives a WM_PAINT or WM_SIZE message.
member.param: A pointer to an structure that specifies the source rectangle. The source rectangle defines the area of the video frame that is displayed. If this parameter is NULL, the entire video frame is displayed.
A pointer to a structure that specifies the destination rectangle. The destination rectangle defines the area of the window or DirectComposition visual where the video is drawn.
The border color. Use the macro to create this value.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFCapturePreviewSink
member.summary: Controls the preview sink. The preview sink enables the application to preview audio and video from the camera.
